preqs: MGB1010 or MGC1010 or MGF1010 or MGG1010 or MGP1010 or MGS1010 or MGW1010.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGB1010, MGC1010, MGF1010, MGG1010, MGP1010, MGS1010, MGW1010} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: Inclusive management is concerned with leveraging society's diversity for the benefit of individuals, groups and organisations. In the unit, students will develop a greater understanding of difference and inclusion, identify inclusive management opportunities for different contexts and practice approaches to effectively implement these changes. Current business trends and future directions for research are covered. The unit prepares students to manage effectively, garnering positive and inclusive individual, group and organisational outcomes.
